data.eml:eml: Indonaiarectangularis (Tapparone-Canefri, 1889), comb. nov., a forgotten freshwater mussel species from Myanmar (Bivalvia, Unionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bolotov, Ivan N., Vikhrev, Ilya V., Lopes-Lima, Manuel, Mikhail Y. Gofarov,, Konopleva, Ekaterina S., Lunn, Zau, Chan, Nyein, Bogan, Arthur E. (2019): Indonaiarectangularis (Tapparone-Canefri, 1889), comb. nov., a forgotten freshwater mussel species from Myanmar (Bivalvia, Unionidae). ZooKeys 852: 23-30, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.852.33898, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.852.33898
